text: Aur jab (samandar mein ) in logon par ek mauj saayebaano(like canopies) ki tarah chaaa jaati hai to yeh Allah ko pukarte hain apne deen ko bilkul usi ke liye khaalis karke. Phir jab woh bacha kar inhein khushki (land) tak pahuncha deta hai to inmein se koi iqtesad baratta (lukewarm) hai.Aur hamari nishaniyon ka inkar nahin karta magar har woh shaks jo gaddaar aur nashukra hai
